original: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni khams gsum na spyod la /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni khams gsum na spyod la /
translated: That which arises from the wealth of noble beings is experienced in the three realms,

original: ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir sa thams cad pa yin no //
analyzed: ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir sa thams cad pa yin no //
translated: but it is not of all stages because it is not possessed.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
translated: Moreover, that which arises from the wealth of non-noble beings

original: phyis 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor thob par byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: phyis 'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor thob par byed pa ma yin la /
translated: does not later cause the acquisition of the wealth of noble beings or non-noble beings.

original: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni phyis 'phags pa'i nor thob par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni phyis 'phags pa'i nor thob par byed pa yin no //
translated: That which arises from the wealth of noble beings later causes the acquisition of the wealth of noble beings.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
translated: Moreover, that which arises from the wealth of non-noble beings

original: longs spyod na yongs su zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur la /
analyzed: longs spyod na yongs su zad cing mthar thug par 'gyur la /
translated: is exhausted and terminated when enjoyed.

original: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni bsten na rgya che ba dang / 'phel ba dang / yangs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni bsten na rgya che ba dang / 'phel ba dang / yangs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The wealth that comes from the noble ones is vast, increases, and expands when used.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
translated: Moreover, the wealth that comes from the non-noble ones

original: rgyal po rnams sam /
analyzed: rgyal po rnams sam /
translated: can be taken by kings,

original: tshem rkun rnams sam /
analyzed: tshem rkun rnams sam /
translated: thieves,

original: dgra rnams sam /
analyzed: dgra rnams sam /
translated: enemies,

original: me 'am / chu 'am gzhan dag gis gcad du rung la /
analyzed: me 'am / chu 'am gzhan dag gis gcad du rung la /
translated: fire, water, and others.

original: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni gcad du med pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni gcad du med pa yin no //
translated: The wealth that comes from the noble ones cannot be taken away.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
translated: Moreover, the wealth that comes from the non-noble ones

original: 'di nas blangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di nas blangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur ba ma yin la /
translated: cannot be taken from here and carried along.

original: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
translated: The wealth that comes from the noble ones

original: 'di nas blangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: 'di nas blangs nas 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: can be taken from here and carried along.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni bsten na chog mi shes pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni bsten na chog mi shes pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, the wealth that comes from the non-noble ones is not satisfying when used.

original: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni bsten na mthar phyin nas chog shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni bsten na mthar phyin nas chog shes pa yin no //
translated: The wealth that comes from the noble ones is satisfying when used, because it is brought to completion.

original: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i nor las byung ba ni /
translated: Moreover, the wealth of those who are not noble is

original: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / khon dang bcas pa dang / @50a * //
analyzed: 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang / khon dang bcas pa dang / @50a * //
translated: frightening, accompanied by enmity,

original: gnod pa dang bcas pa dang / yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang / phyis kyang sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gnod pa dang bcas pa dang / yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang / phyis kyang sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ste /
translated: accompanied by violence, accompanied by anguish, and does not lead to the abandonment of suffering in the future.

original: de la 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal skyer dogs pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'jigs pa dang bcas pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal skyer dogs pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is frightening because it is the basis for the fear of future suffering.

original: de la kho na dang bcas pa ni 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la kho na dang bcas pa ni 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'bru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is accompanied by enmity because it is the basis for quarrels, disputes, and arguments.

original: de la gnod pa dang bcas pa ni na ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la gnod pa dang bcas pa ni na ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, it is accompanied by violence because it is the basis for sickness, old age, and death.

original: de la yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa ni /
analyzed: de la yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa ni /
translated: Here, it is accompanied by anguish because

original: mdze nad phrugs pa bzhin du bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin zhing /
analyzed: mdze nad phrugs pa bzhin du bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin zhing /
translated: it is not completely satisfying, like a festering boil.

original: phyin ci log gi gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log gi gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the basis for the abode of error, and because it is the basis for the abode of sorrow, lamentation, suffering, unhappiness, and perturbation.

original: de la phyis kyang sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la phyis kyang sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gzhi'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And it is not the case that later on suffering will be abandoned, because it is the basis for the abode of the afflictions and the secondary afflictions such as passion.

original: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni 'jigs pa med pa dang / khon med pa dang gnod pa med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / phyis kyang sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i nor las byung ba ni 'jigs pa med pa dang / khon med pa dang gnod pa med pa dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa dang / phyis kyang sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: The noble ones are free from fear, free from enmity, free from harm, free from distress, and later on suffering is abandoned.

original: de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ci rigs par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i tshul gyis ci rigs par rig par bya'o //
translated: The opposite of that should be understood as appropriate.

original: yang 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni phyi rol gyi 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i longs spyod las rnam pa lngas khyad par du 'phags te /
analyzed: yang 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni phyi rol gyi 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i longs spyod las rnam pa lngas khyad par du 'phags te /
translated: Moreover, the enjoyment of Dharma of the noble ones who live by wisdom is superior to the enjoyment of desire of those who are attached to external desires in five ways.

original: des na 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams la bla na med pa'i shes rab kyis 'tsho bas 'tsho ba zhes bya ste /
analyzed: des na 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams la bla na med pa'i shes rab kyis 'tsho bas 'tsho ba zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, the noble ones who live by wisdom are said to live by the unsurpassed wisdom that is the enjoyment of Dharma.

original: chos kyi longs spyod kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod gtan du nges pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod gcig tu nges pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod shes rab kyis 'tsho ba dang / de las gzhan pa'i shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /
analyzed: chos kyi longs spyod kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod gtan du nges pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod gcig tu nges pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod shes rab kyis 'tsho ba dang / de las gzhan pa'i shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams dang /
translated: The enjoyment of Dharma is uncontaminated, the enjoyment of Dharma is certain for a long time, the enjoyment of Dharma is certain as one thing, the enjoyment of Dharma is living by wisdom, and it is not shared with those who live by other wisdoms.

original: thun mong ma yin pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa dang / chos kyi longs spyod bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa bdud dang phyir rgol ba nges par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not shared with those who live by other wisdoms, it is the complete perfection of the bliss of the enjoyment of Dharma, and it is the definite destruction of demons and opponents.

original: de la 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu ni rjes su chags pa dang ldan /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba yid bde ba'i gnas lta bu ni rjes su chags pa dang ldan /
translated: The pleasures of desire of those who desire are associated with attachment, like the basis of mental satisfaction.

original: yid @50b mi bde ba'i gnas lta bu ni khong khro ba dang ldan /
analyzed: yid @50b mi bde ba'i gnas lta bu ni khong khro ba dang ldan /
translated: They are associated with anger, like the basis of mental dissatisfaction.

original: btang snyoms kyi gnas lta bu ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i btang snyoms dang ldan la /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi gnas lta bu ni so sor brtags pa ma yin pa'i btang snyoms dang ldan la /
translated: They are associated with non-discursive equanimity, like the basis of equanimity.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But the enjoyment of Dharma of the noble ones who live by wisdom is not like that.

original: gzhan yang 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni sngon kyi mthar mi mngon te /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pa can rnams kyi 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni sngon kyi mthar mi mngon te /
translated: Moreover, the enjoyment of desire of those who desire is not evident in the past.

original: mi rtag pas 'dod pa gzhan dag 'dod cing /
analyzed: mi rtag pas 'dod pa gzhan dag 'dod cing /
translated: Because of impermanence, they desire other desires.

original: 'dod pa gzhan dag 'thob la /
analyzed: 'dod pa gzhan dag 'thob la /
translated: They obtain other desires.

original: res 'ga' ni 'thob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: res 'ga' ni 'thob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Sometimes they do not obtain them.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But the enjoyment of Dharma of the noble ones who live by wisdom is not like that.

original: gzhan yang 'dod pa can 'dod pa'i longs spyod la gnas pa rnams las /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pa can 'dod pa'i longs spyod la gnas pa rnams las /
translated: Moreover, among those who desire and abide in the enjoyment of desire,

original: kha cig ni dngos po de nyid yid bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur /🔽kha cig gi ni de nyid yid mi bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur ba dang / de dag la yang dus la lar ni yid bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur /
analyzed: kha cig ni dngos po de nyid yid bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur / kha cig gi ni de nyid yid mi bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur ba dang / de dag la yang dus la lar ni yid bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur /
translated: For some, that very thing becomes a basis for mental satisfaction.🔽For some, that very thing becomes a basis for mental dissatisfaction.

original: dus la lar ni yid mi bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur la /
analyzed: dus la lar ni yid mi bde ba'i gnas lta bur 'gyur la /
translated: And for some, that very thing becomes a basis for mental satisfaction at one time and a basis for mental dissatisfaction at another time.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But the enjoyment of Dharma for noble beings who live by wisdom is not like that.

original: gzhan yang 'di las phyi rol pa'i shes rab kyis 'tsho ba 'dod pa kun nas spangs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di las phyi rol pa'i shes rab kyis 'tsho ba 'dod pa kun nas spangs pa rnams ni /
translated: Moreover, those who live by wisdom outside this system, who are free from desire for all objects of desire,

original: lta bar gyur pa rang gi rtog pas kun nas bslang ba log par mos pa'i gzhi de dang de dag la nan tan gyis mchog tu bzung nas /
analyzed: lta bar gyur pa rang gi rtog pas kun nas bslang ba log par mos pa'i gzhi de dang de dag la nan tan gyis mchog tu bzung nas /
translated: are diligent in those views that are the bases of wrong belief, which are motivated by their own thoughts, and they hold them to be supreme.

original: sems mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa de yang rjes su 'brel pa nyid yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral par gyur pa rnams kyang yang phyir ldog par 'gyur la /
analyzed: sems mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa de yang rjes su 'brel pa nyid yin pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral par gyur pa rnams kyang yang phyir ldog par 'gyur la /
translated: Those who are free from desire return again.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no//
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no//
translated: But the enjoyment of the Dharma of the noble ones who live by wisdom is not like that.

original: gzhan yang 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams dang / de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba 'jig rten pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba dang / dben pa'i bde ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams dang / de'i 'dod chags dang bral ba 'jig rten pa rnams kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba dang / dben pa'i bde ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin la /
translated: Moreover, the worldly happiness of desire of those who enjoy desire and those who are free from the attachment of desire, and the happiness of seclusion, are not complete.

original: bdud dang phyir rgol ba dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: bdud dang phyir rgol ba dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: They are connected with Mara and opposition.

original: sgyu ma lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu mar byas pa'i rgyan lta bu gang yin pa de la byis pa 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams dang /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu mar byas pa'i rgyan lta bu gang yin pa de la byis pa 'dod pa la longs spyod pa rnams dang /
translated: The childish who enjoy desire,

original: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba /
translated: those who are free from worldly attachment,

original: smyon pa lta bu /
analyzed: smyon pa lta bu /
translated: those who are like the insane,

original: ra ro ba la sogs ba lta bu /
analyzed: ra ro ba la sogs ba lta bu /
translated: those who are drunk, and so on,

original: bdud kyi g-yul las ma rgyal ba rnams rab tu bsten @51a * //
analyzed: bdud kyi g-yul las ma rgyal ba rnams rab tu bsten @51a * //
translated: those who have not won the battle against Māra,

original: cing longs spyod par byed de /
analyzed: cing longs spyod par byed de /
translated: they enjoy and indulge in them.

original: de bas na de yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / bdud dang phyi rgol ba nges par bcom pa yin la /
analyzed: de bas na de yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / bdud dang phyi rgol ba nges par bcom pa yin la /
translated: Therefore, they are not complete, and they have not conquered Māra and his army.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyis 'tsho ba rnams kyi chos kyi longs spyod ni de lta ma yin no //
translated: But the enjoyment of the Dharma of the noble ones who live by wisdom is not like that.

original: yang khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: yang khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi lus ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, the bodies of sentient beings who live in the three realms are as follows:

original: gnas ngan len dang ldan pa'i phyir phol mig kun nas tsha ba lta bur blta'o //
analyzed: gnas ngan len dang ldan pa'i phyir phol mig kun nas tsha ba lta bur blta'o //
translated: It is like a boil that is hot all over because it is full of pus.

original: lus de la bde ba'i tshor ba 'byung ba ji ltar blta zhe na /
analyzed: lus de la bde ba'i tshor ba 'byung ba ji ltar blta zhe na /
translated: How should one regard the pleasant feeling that arises in this body?

original: dper na phol mig kun nas tsha ba la bsil ba'i reg pa bab pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na phol mig kun nas tsha ba la bsil ba'i reg pa bab pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the application of a cold compress to a boil that is hot all over.

original: lus de la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'byung ba ji ltar blta zhe na /
analyzed: lus de la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'byung ba ji ltar blta zhe na /
translated: How should one regard the painful feeling that arises in this body?

original: dper na phol mig kun nas tsha ba la sman 'gyur byed bab pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na phol mig kun nas tsha ba la sman 'gyur byed bab pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the application of a medicinal compress to a boil that is hot all over.

original: lus de la sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba ji ltar blta zhe na /🔽dper na phol mig kun nas tsha ba de nyid la bsil ba dang / sman 'gyur byed kyi reg pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: lus de la sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba ji ltar blta zhe na / dper na phol mig kun nas tsha ba de nyid la bsil ba dang / sman 'gyur byed kyi reg pa ma yin pa /
translated: How should one regard the neither pleasant nor painful feeling that arises in this body?

original: rang bzhin gyi kun nas tsha ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyi kun nas tsha ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the natural heat of the boil itself, which is neither the application of the cold compress nor the medicinal compress.

original: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i tshor ba ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba zhes gsungs la /
analyzed: de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba'i tshor ba ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba zhes gsungs la /
translated: Therefore, the Blessed One said, “Pleasant feeling should be regarded as a form of suffering because it changes. ”

original: sdug bsngal ba ni /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ni /
translated: The suffering of suffering is

original: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: the suffering of the suffering of suffering. The feeling that is neither pleasure nor pain is the suffering of the suffering of conditioned being.

original: yang zang zing dang bcas pa'i dga' ba yang yod /
analyzed: yang zang zing dang bcas pa'i dga' ba yang yod /
translated: There is joy that is material,

original: zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod /
analyzed: zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod /
translated: there is joy that is not material,

original: zang zing med pa bas kyang ches zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de yang mdo nyid las ji skad rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: zang zing med pa bas kyang ches zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa gang yin pa de yang mdo nyid las ji skad rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: and there is joy that is more not material than not material.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis khams gnyis na yod pa'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i bde ba ni /🔽bde ba rnams kyi mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de yang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis khams gnyis na yod pa'i 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i bde ba ni / bde ba rnams kyi mchog tu rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de yang /
translated: The Blessed One has declared that the happiness of the cessation of the ideation and sensation that exist in two realms🔽is the highest of all happinesses.

original: gnas pa'i bde ba las dgongs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gnas pa'i bde ba las dgongs pa yin gyi /
translated: This is stated with reference to the happiness of abiding.

original: tshor pa'i bde ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor pa'i bde ba ni ma yin no //
translated: but not the pleasure of feeling.

original: bde ba gsum po 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral ba zhes gsungs pa'i bde ba gsum po de dag ni zag pa med pa'i dbyings nyid la yod de /
analyzed: bde ba gsum po 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba dang / gti mug dang bral ba zhes gsungs pa'i bde ba gsum po de dag ni zag pa med pa'i dbyings nyid la yod de /

analyzed: rgyu bcu dang / rkyen bzhi dang / 'bras bu lnga'o //
translated: There are ten causes, four conditions and five effects.

original: rgyu bcu po dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu bcu po dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten causes?

original: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu dang / ltos pa'i rgyu dang / 'phen pa'i rgyu dang / mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang / 'dren pa'i rgyu dang / so sor nges pa'i rgyu dang / lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dang /
analyzed: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu dang / ltos pa'i rgyu dang / 'phen pa'i rgyu dang / mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu dang / yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu dang / 'dren pa'i rgyu dang / so sor nges pa'i rgyu dang / lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu dang /
translated: The cause of designation, the cause of dependence, the projecting cause, the producing cause, the cause of support, the cause of provenance, the cause of specification, the co-operating cause,

original: mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang / mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i rgyu dang / mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: the opposing cause and the non-opposing cause.

original: rkyen bzhi po dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: rkyen bzhi po dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the four conditions?

original: rgyu'i rkyen dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen dang / bdag po'i rkyen to //
analyzed: rgyu'i rkyen dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dang / dmigs pa'i rkyen dang / bdag po'i rkyen to //
translated: The causal condition, the homogeneous immediate condition, the condition by predominance and the condition of object.

original: 'bras bu lnga po dag gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu lnga po dag gang zhe na /
translated: What are the five effects?

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / bral ba'i 'bras bu dang / skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu dang / bdag po'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: 1. the ripened effect, 2. the effect of uniform outflow, 3. the effect of disconnection, 4. the effect of human action, 5. the governing effect.

original: rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa gang yin zhe na /🔽de la rgyu'i gnas tshig la brten nas /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa gang yin zhe na / de la rgyu'i gnas tshig la brten nas /
translated: What is the definition of cause, condition and effect?

original: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: In regard to the cause, there is the designation of cause of designation.

original: @55a * // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: @55a * // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la ming rnam par gzhag pa sngar byung nas /🔽'du shes 'jug go //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la ming rnam par gzhag pa sngar byung nas / 'du shes 'jug go //
translated: Because, in regard to the factors associated with the realm of desire, the realm of form, the formless realm, and the factors not associated with the elements, the designation of name comes first.🔽After that, there is the designation of the notion.

original: 'du shes sngar byung nas tshig 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'du shes sngar byung nas tshig 'byung ngo //
translated: After the designation of the notion, there is the designation of speech.

original: tshig gis ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar bye brag byed pa dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa bzhin du rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshig gis ji ltar mthong ba dang / ji ltar thos pa dang / ji ltar bye brag byed pa dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa bzhin du rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: because they designate in accordance with what they see, hear, discern, and are conscious of.

original: de lta bas na tshig la brten nas rjes su tha snyad 'dogs ba'i rgyu 'dogs so //🔽de la rgyu'i gnas myong ba la brten nas /
analyzed: de lta bas na tshig la brten nas rjes su tha snyad 'dogs ba'i rgyu 'dogs so // de la rgyu'i gnas myong ba la brten nas /
translated: Therefore, designation is the cause of subsequent designation that is based on words.

original: ltos pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: ltos pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: In this regard, designation is the cause of dependence that is based on the experience of a cause.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽de la ltos nas 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa 'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni / de la ltos nas 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa 'am /
translated: Because those who desire pleasure

original: kun sogs pa'am /
analyzed: kun sogs pa'am /
translated: seek to obtain, accumulate, and preserve the objects of their desire.

original: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Those who desire the pleasure of the form and formless realms

original: de la ltos nas de'i rkyen rnyed pa 'am /
analyzed: de la ltos nas de'i rkyen rnyed pa 'am /
translated: seek to obtain the conditions for that.

original: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba dang / ldan pa ma yin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba dang / ldan pa ma yin pa'i bde ba 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The desire for happiness that is not dependent on anything else is the search for the conditions of that happiness.

original: de la ltos nas de'i rkyen rnyed pa 'am /
analyzed: de la ltos nas de'i rkyen rnyed pa 'am /
translated: The desire for the happiness that is dependent on something else is the search for the conditions of that happiness.

original: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni /🔽de la ltos nas de'i rkyen rnams sam /
analyzed: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba dang / sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni / de la ltos nas de'i rkyen rnams sam /
translated: The desire to avoid suffering is the search for the conditions of the avoidance of suffering.

original: de spong ba'i rkyen rnams spong ba 'am /🔽rnyed pa 'am /
analyzed: de spong ba'i rkyen rnams spong ba 'am / rnyed pa 'am /
translated: The desire to avoid the conditions of suffering is the search for the conditions of the avoidance of suffering.

original: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: so sor brten pa yongs su tshol ba'i phyir te /
translated: The desire to obtain the conditions of the avoidance of suffering is the search for the conditions of the avoidance of suffering.

original: de bas na myong ba la brten nas ltos pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //🔽de la rgyu'i gnas bag chags la brten nas /
analyzed: de bas na myong ba la brten nas ltos pa'i rgyu 'dogs so // de la rgyu'i gnas bag chags la brten nas /
translated: Therefore, the designation of the cause of experience is the designation of the cause of dependence.

original: phan pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: phan pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: The designation of the cause of benefit is based on the cause of the latent propensities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i 'du byed rnams kyis khams gsum du sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba rnams su /
analyzed: 'di ltar dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i 'du byed rnams kyis khams gsum du sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa'i 'gro ba rnams su /
translated: Because the formations that are imbued with virtuous and nonvirtuous karma lead to the pleasant and unpleasant destinies in the three realms.

original: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i lus rnams 'phen par byed pa dang / de nyid kyi dbang gis phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyang /
analyzed: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i lus rnams 'phen par byed pa dang / de nyid kyi dbang gis phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams kyang /
translated: And it is also the cause that, by its power, makes external things

original: phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgud par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgud par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: prosper or decline.

original: de bas na 'du byed rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi bag chags la brten nas 'phen pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: de bas na 'du byed rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi bag chags la brten nas 'phen pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: Therefore, it is the cause that impels the formations based on the latent tendencies of virtuous and nonvirtuous actions.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas rlan dang bcas pa'i sa bon la @55b brten nas mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas rlan dang bcas pa'i sa bon la @55b brten nas mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: In this regard, it is the cause of actualization that is based on the seed together with the moisture of the cause.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams /
translated: Because the phenomena associated with the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm

original: rang rang gi sa bon las 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sred pa ni sa bon gyi rlan ces bya ste /
analyzed: rang rang gi sa bon las 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sred pa ni sa bon gyi rlan ces bya ste /
translated: arise from their respective seeds, and craving is called the moisture of the seed.

original: de bas na des sa bon brlan nas lus 'phags pa rnams mngon par 'grub bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na des sa bon brlan nas lus 'phags pa rnams mngon par 'grub bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore, when the seed is moistened by that moisture, the bodies of the higher realms are actualized.

original: skye ba'i rgyu ni las yin la //
analyzed: skye ba'i rgyu ni las yin la //
translated: The cause of birth is action.

original: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu ni sred pa yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu ni sred pa yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /
translated: The cause of actualization is craving.

original: de bas na rlan dang bcas pa'i sa bon la brten nas mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: de bas na rlan dang bcas pa'i sa bon la brten nas mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: Thus, the cause of actualization is designated in dependence on a seed with moisture.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas phrad nas 'gags pa la yang brten la /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas phrad nas 'gags pa la yang brten la /
translated: The cause of appropriation is designated in dependence on the cessation of the cause of appropriation having met with its basis.

original: de bzhin du rgyu'i gnas yul dang / dbang po dang / byed pa dang / skyes bu'i byed ba dang / de kho na la yang lta ba la brten nas yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu'i gnas yul dang / dbang po dang / byed pa dang / skyes bu'i byed ba dang / de kho na la yang lta ba la brten nas yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: Similarly, the cause of appropriation is designated in dependence on the cause of appropriation having met with its basis, the object, the sense faculty, the action, the agent, and the view of reality.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi nang nas 'du byed rnams kyi 'jug pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi nang nas 'du byed rnams kyi 'jug pa /
translated: Because among the phenomena associated with desire, the engagement of formations

original: de ma thag tu 'gags pas yongs su zin pa dang / yul gyis yongs su zin pa dang / dbang pos yongs su zin pa dang / byed pas yongs su zin pa dang / skyes bu'i byed pas yongs su zin pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ma thag tu 'gags pas yongs su zin pa dang / yul gyis yongs su zin pa dang / dbang pos yongs su zin pa dang / byed pas yongs su zin pa dang / skyes bu'i byed pas yongs su zin pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is grasped by the immediately preceding condition, by the object, by the sense faculty, by the action, and by the agent.

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: Just as the dharmas associated with the realm of desire, so also are those associated with the realm of form and the formless realm.

original: de kho na la lta bas yongs su zin pa'i chos de las gzhan pa ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang 'jug par 'gyur te /🔽de bas na phrad nas 'gags pa dang / yul dang dbang po dang byed pa dang / skyes bu'i byed pa dang / de kho na la lta ba la brten nas /
analyzed: de kho na la lta bas yongs su zin pa'i chos de las gzhan pa ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang 'jug par 'gyur te / de bas na phrad nas 'gags pa dang / yul dang dbang po dang byed pa dang / skyes bu'i byed pa dang / de kho na la lta ba la brten nas /
translated: The dharmas not associated with that, which are grasped by the view of reality, also occur.

original: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: Therefore, the designation of the cause of grasping is made in dependence on the cessation through contact, on the object, on the sense faculty, on the action, on the agent, and on the view of reality.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas mthun pa la brten nas /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas mthun pa la brten nas /
translated: In dependence on the cause of the homogeneous character,

original: 'dren ba'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'dren ba'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: the designation of the leading cause is made.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams ni 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams 'dren to //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams ni 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams 'dren to //
translated: Thus, wholesome phenomena associated with the desire realm lead to wholesome phenomena associated with the desire realm that are distinctive.

original: de bzhin du 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams ni gzugs dang ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang / ldan pa ma yin pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams kyang @56a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams ni gzugs dang ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang / ldan pa ma yin pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams kyang @56a * //
translated: Similarly, wholesome phenomena associated with the desire realm lead to wholesome phenomena associated with the form realm, the formless realm, and those that are not associated with any realm.

original: 'dren te / de dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dren te / de dang mthun pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are conducive to that.

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as it is with those associated with the desire realm,

original: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams kyang /
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams kyang /
translated: so it is with those associated with the form realm.

original: gzugs dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang / ldan pa ma yin pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'dren to //
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa dang / ldan pa ma yin pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'dren to //
translated: Wholesome phenomena associated with the form realm lead to wholesome phenomena associated with the form realm that are distinctive, as well as to wholesome phenomena associated with the formless realm and those that are not associated with any realm.

original: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
translated: Just as it is with those associated with the form realm,

original: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang /
translated: so it is with those associated with the formless realm.

original: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i rnams 'dren to //🔽gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang ldan pa ma yin pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams 'dren to //🔽'dus ma byas pa mngon sum du byas pa yang 'dren to //
analyzed: gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i rnams 'dren to // gzugs med pa dang ldan pa'i rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang ldan pa ma yin pa'i dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams 'dren to // 'dus ma byas pa mngon sum du byas pa yang 'dren to //
translated: The wholesome factors associated with the formless realm and the unassociated factors are also included.🔽The unassociated factors are like the factors associated with the formless realm.🔽The unassociated wholesome factors and the unconditioned factors that are directly realized are also included.

original: de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams 'dren te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyang mi dge ba'i chos khyad par can rnams 'dren te /
translated: In the same way, the unwholesome factors include the unwholesome factors that are associated with the formless realm and the unassociated factors.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / lta ba dang / the tshom dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa 'dren to /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ni zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / lta ba dang / the tshom dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang / ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa 'dren to /
translated: Desire, hatred, ignorance, pride, views, doubt, misconduct of body, speech, and mind.

original: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as with desire,

original: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / lta ba dang / the tshom rnams kyang ci rigs par 'dren par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / lta ba dang / the tshom rnams kyang ci rigs par 'dren par rig par bya'o //
translated: Hatred, delusion, pride, false views, and doubt are also to be understood as being drawn in various ways.

original: de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams 'dren to //
analyzed: de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams kyang dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams 'dren to //
translated: In the same way, neutral dharmas draw virtuous and nonvirtuous dharmas, and neutral dharmas.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sa bon can kun gzhi rnam par shes pas 'dren to //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sa bon can kun gzhi rnam par shes pas 'dren to //
translated: the store consciousness, which has seeds of the virtuous, nonvirtuous, and neutral, draws them in.

original: de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams ni /
translated: In the same way, neutral dharmas

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos khyad par can rnams kyang 'dren te /
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i chos khyad par can rnams kyang 'dren te /
translated: draw special neutral dharmas.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: For example,

original: kham gyi zas ni sems can byung ba rnams gnas pa dang / 'tsho bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: kham gyi zas ni sems can byung ba rnams gnas pa dang / 'tsho bar byed pa yin te /
translated: material food sustains and nourishes living beings who have already arisen.

original: de dang mthun pa'i phyir mdangs dang / stobs dang lta ba 'dren te /
analyzed: de dang mthun pa'i phyir mdangs dang / stobs dang lta ba 'dren te /
translated: It draws in radiance, strength, and vision that are in harmony with it.

original: de bas na mthun pa la brten nas /
analyzed: de bas na mthun pa la brten nas /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on what is in harmony,

original: 'dren pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: 'dren pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: the cause of drawing in is designated.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas dang mthu sna tshogs la brten nas /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas dang mthu sna tshogs la brten nas /
translated: The various causes and powers are the basis for this.🔽

original: so sor nges pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: The various causes are designated in dependence on the various bases and powers.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos @56b ngo bo nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos @56b ngo bo nyid rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams ni /
translated: Because the various phenomena associated with the desire realm arise from the various specific natures,

original: ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi khyad par rnam pa sna tshogs /
translated: the various specific powers,

original: mthu rnam pa sna tshogs can las byung ba'i phyir ro //🔽'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: mthu rnam pa sna tshogs can las byung ba'i phyir ro // 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: and the various specific abilities.

original: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Just as with the desire realm, the same is true for the form realm, the formless realm, and the realm that is not associated with these.

original: de bas na mthu sna tshogs la brten nas /
analyzed: de bas na mthu sna tshogs la brten nas /
translated: Therefore, in dependence on the various powers,

original: so sor nges pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: the various causes are designated.

original: de la rgyu'i gnas sna tshogs pa la brten nas /
analyzed: de la rgyu'i gnas sna tshogs pa la brten nas /
translated: In dependence on the various bases of causes,

original: lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dod par byed de /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dod par byed de /
translated: the cooperative causes are accepted.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: 'di ltar rang skye ba'i tshogs dang phrad nas 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rang skye ba'i tshogs dang phrad nas 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In fact, when the collection of causes of arising is present, the factors that are to be produced arise.

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as the factors that are to be produced,

original: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: so also are the factors that are to be obtained, the factors that are to be accomplished, the factors that are to be manifested, the factors that are to be sustained, and the factors that are to be produced.

original: skye ba'i tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa'i tshogs pa dang / grub par 'gyur ba'i tshogs pa dang / 'grub pa'i tshogs pa dang / gnas pa'i tshogs pa dang / byed pa'i tshogs pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: skye ba'i tshogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa'i tshogs pa dang / grub par 'gyur ba'i tshogs pa dang / 'grub pa'i tshogs pa dang / gnas pa'i tshogs pa dang / byed pa'i tshogs pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Just as the collection of causes of arising, so also are the collection of causes of obtaining, the collection of causes of accomplishing, the collection of causes of manifesting, the collection of causes of sustaining, and the collection of causes of producing.

original: de bas na tshogs pa la brten nas lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //🔽de la rgyu'i gnas bar du gcod pa la brten nas /
analyzed: de bas na tshogs pa la brten nas lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu 'dogs so // de la rgyu'i gnas bar du gcod pa la brten nas /
translated: Therefore, the designation of the cooperative cause is based on the collection.

original: mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: In this regard, the designation of the opposing cause is based on the obstruction of a cause.

original: da ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: da ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: What is the reason?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams skye ba la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams skye ba la /
translated: In fact, when the factors that are to be produced are produced,

original: gal te bar du gcod pa nye bar gnas par gyur na skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te bar du gcod pa nye bar gnas par gyur na skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because if an obstacle were to arise, it would not arise.

original: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: As is the case with the factors that are associated with the realm of desire,

original: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o /
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o /
translated: so it is with the factors that are associated with the form realm, the formless realm, and those that are not associated.

original: skye ba ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: skye ba ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: As is the case with the arising of a factor,

original: thob pa dang / grub par 'gyur pa dang / 'grub pa dang / gnas pa dang / byed pa la yang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: thob pa dang / grub par 'gyur pa dang / 'grub pa dang / gnas pa dang / byed pa la yang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: so it is with its possession, its establishment as a cause, its establishment as a result, its duration, and its activity.

original: de bas na bar du gcod pa la brten nas mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //🔽de la rgyu'i gnas par du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas /
analyzed: de bas na bar du gcod pa la brten nas mi mthun pa'i rgyu 'dogs so // de la rgyu'i gnas par du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas /
translated: Therefore, the designation of a cause that is not incompatible is made in dependence upon an obstacle.

original: mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs par byed de /
translated: In this case, the designation of a cause that is not incompatible is made in dependence upon that which is not an obstacle to the persistence of a cause.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams skye ba la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i chos rnams skye ba la /
translated: Because, in the case of the arising of a factor that is associated with the realm of desire,

original: gal te par du gcod pa ma yin pa nye bar gnas par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te par du gcod pa ma yin pa nye bar gnas par gyur na /
translated: if that which is not an obstacle were to arise,

original: de dag skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //🔽'dod @57a * //
analyzed: de dag skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // 'dod @57a * //
translated: because they are produced.

original: pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: pa dang ldan pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: As is the case with those who are in the realm of desire,

original: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang / ldan pa ma yin pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: so is it with those who are in the realm of form and with those who are in the formless realm, and with those who are not in any of these three realms.

original: skye ba ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa dang / grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'grub pa dang / gnas pa dang / byed pa yang de dang 'dra ste /🔽de bas na bar du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas /
analyzed: skye ba ji lta ba bzhin du thob pa dang / grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'grub pa dang / gnas pa dang / byed pa yang de dang 'dra ste / de bas na bar du gcod pa ma yin pa la brten nas /
translated: As is the case with birth, so is it with acquisition, with establishment, with accomplishment, with duration, and with activity.

original: mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
analyzed: mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyu 'dogs so //
translated: Therefore, the non-obstructing is designated as the cause of the absence of opposition.

original: de la rkyen gyi gnas sa bon la brten nas /
analyzed: de la rkyen gyi gnas sa bon la brten nas /
translated: In this regard, the seed is the basis of the condition.

original: rgyu'i rkyen 'dogs so //
analyzed: rgyu'i rkyen 'dogs so //
translated: The causal condition is designated in dependence on it.

original: rkyen gyi gnas phrad nas 'gag pa la brten nas de ma thag pa'i rkyen 'dogs so //
analyzed: rkyen gyi gnas phrad nas 'gag pa la brten nas de ma thag pa'i rkyen 'dogs so //
translated: The immediate condition is designated in dependence on the basis of the condition that is the cessation of the contact.

original: de la rkyen gyi gnas yul la brten nas /
analyzed: de la rkyen gyi gnas yul la brten nas /
translated: In this regard, the object is the basis of the condition.

original: dmigs pa'i rkyen 'dogs so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i rkyen 'dogs so //
translated: The objective condition is designated in dependence on it.

original: rkyen gyi gnas de las gzhan pa rnams la brten nas /
analyzed: rkyen gyi gnas de las gzhan pa rnams la brten nas /
translated: The remaining bases of the conditions are the basis of the condition.

original: bdag po'i rkyen 'dogs so //🔽de la rgyu'i gnas dang / rkyen gyi gnas bag chags dang / mthun pa la brten nas /
analyzed: bdag po'i rkyen 'dogs so // de la rgyu'i gnas dang / rkyen gyi gnas bag chags dang / mthun pa la brten nas /
translated: The dominant condition is the dominant result.🔽The causal condition and the objective condition are the cause and the object of the cause.

original: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs so //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang / rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs so //
translated: The result of evolution and the natural result are established on the basis of the causal condition and the objective condition.

original: rgyu'i gnas dang / rkyen gyi gnas de kho na la lta ba la brten nas bral ba'i 'bras bu 'dogs so //🔽rgyu'i gnas dang rkyen gyi gnas skyes bu'i byed pa la brten nas /
analyzed: rgyu'i gnas dang / rkyen gyi gnas de kho na la lta ba la brten nas bral ba'i 'bras bu 'dogs so // rgyu'i gnas dang rkyen gyi gnas skyes bu'i byed pa la brten nas /
translated: The result of separation is established on the basis of the causal condition and the objective condition, the view of reality.

original: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs so //🔽rgyu'i gnas dang / rkyen gyi gnas lhag ma rnams la brten nas /
analyzed: skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu 'dogs so // rgyu'i gnas dang / rkyen gyi gnas lhag ma rnams la brten nas /
translated: The result of the human agent is established on the basis of the causal condition and the objective condition, the activity of the human agent.

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu 'dogs so //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu 'dogs so //
translated: The dominant result is established on the basis of the remaining causal conditions and objective conditions.

original: de la rgyu ni phan pa'i don to //
analyzed: de la rgyu ni phan pa'i don to //
translated: Here, cause means benefit.

original: rkyen ni gnas par byed pa'i don to //
analyzed: rkyen ni gnas par byed pa'i don to //
translated: Condition means support.

original: 'bras bu ni grub pa'i don to /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni grub pa'i don to /
translated: Result means accomplishment.

original: yang rgyu ni rnam pa ldar gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: yang rgyu ni rnam pa ldar gzhag pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, cause is posited in five aspects.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows.

original: skyed pa'i rgyu dang / thabs kyi rgyu dang / lhan cig byung ba'i rgyu dang / 'gags ma thag pa dang / 'gags nas ring du lon pa'o //
analyzed: skyed pa'i rgyu dang / thabs kyi rgyu dang / lhan cig byung ba'i rgyu dang / 'gags ma thag pa dang / 'gags nas ring du lon pa'o //
translated: the cause of generation, the cause of method, the cause of co-existence, the cause of immediate cessation, and the cause of long-term cessation.

original: de la skyed pa ni mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: de la skyed pa ni mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: Among them, the cause of generation is the cause of manifestation.

original: thabs kyi rgyu ni lhag ma rnams so //
analyzed: thabs kyi rgyu ni lhag ma rnams so //
translated: The cause of method is the remaining causes.

original: lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The cause of co-existence is as follows:

original: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu las gcig ste /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu las gcig ste /
translated: The cause of possession is one.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i'o //
analyzed: mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i'o //
translated: The eye is the cause of the eye consciousness.

original: de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i ni de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa'i ni de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: Similarly, the ear and so forth are the causes of the other consciousnesses.

original: 'gags ma thag pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'gags ma thag pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The cause of immediate cessation is as follows:

original: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: It is the cause of manifestation.

original: 'gags nas ring du lon pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'gags nas ring du lon pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The cause of long-term cessation is as follows:

original: 'phen pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: 'phen pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: It is the projecting cause.

original: gzhan yang @57b rgyu ni rnam pa ldar gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang @57b rgyu ni rnam pa ldar gzhag pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, the cause is established in five aspects.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: sdug pa'i rgyu dang / mi sdug pa'i rgyu dang / lta ba'i rgyu dang / 'jug pa'i rgyu dang / ldog pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: sdug pa'i rgyu dang / mi sdug pa'i rgyu dang / lta ba'i rgyu dang / 'jug pa'i rgyu dang / ldog pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: the cause of the pleasant, the cause of the unpleasant, the cause of the view, the cause of engagement, and the cause of disengagement.

original: gzhan yang rgyu ni rnam pa bdun du gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang rgyu ni rnam pa bdun du gzhag pa yin te /
translated: Moreover, the cause is established as sevenfold.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: Thus,

original: mi rtag pa ni rgyu yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni rgyu yin te /
translated: the impermanent is the cause.

original: rtag pa'i chos ni skye ba'i rgyu 'am /
analyzed: rtag pa'i chos ni skye ba'i rgyu 'am /
translated: A permanent phenomenon is not a cause of origination,

original: thob pa'i rgyu 'am /🔽grub par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'am /
analyzed: thob pa'i rgyu 'am / grub par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'am /
translated: a cause of attainment,🔽a cause of establishment,

original: 'grub pa'i rgyu 'am /
analyzed: 'grub pa'i rgyu 'am /
translated: a cause of accomplishment,

original: gnas pa'i rgyu 'am /
analyzed: gnas pa'i rgyu 'am /
translated: a cause of duration,

original: byed pa'i rgyu 'am /
analyzed: byed pa'i rgyu 'am /
translated: a cause of activity,

original: gang gi rgyur yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi rgyur yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: or a cause of anything at all.

original: mi rtag pa'i chos mi rtag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yang /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i chos mi rtag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba yang /
translated: An impermanent phenomenon is a cause of the impermanent,

original: dngos po gzhan dang / rang gi ngo bo phyi ma'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan dang / rang gi ngo bo phyi ma'i rgyur 'gyur gyi /
translated: but it is a cause of a subsequent state, either a different entity or its own nature,

original: skad cig de nyid kyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig de nyid kyi ni ma yin no //
translated: but not a cause of that very moment.

original: gzhan dang rang gi ngo bo nyid phyi ma'i rgyu byed du zin kyang skyes la /
analyzed: gzhan dang rang gi ngo bo nyid phyi ma'i rgyu byed du zin kyang skyes la /
translated: Even though it is a cause of a subsequent state, either a different entity or its own nature, it is a cause of that which has arisen,

original: 'gags pas byed kyi ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gags pas byed kyi ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not of that which has not arisen, and it is a cause of that which has ceased, but not of that which has not ceased.

original: skyes la 'gags su zin kyang rkyen gzhan dang phrad na byed kyi ma phrad na mi byed do //
analyzed: skyes la 'gags su zin kyang rkyen gzhan dang phrad na byed kyi ma phrad na mi byed do //
translated: Even though it has arisen and has ceased, if it encounters other conditions, it acts; if it does not encounter them, it does not act.

original: rkyen gzhan dang phrad du zin kyang /
analyzed: rkyen gzhan dang phrad du zin kyang /
translated: Even though it encounters other conditions,

original: snga ma las gyur na byed kyi ma gyur par mi byed do //
analyzed: snga ma las gyur na byed kyi ma gyur par mi byed do //
translated: if it has not changed from the previous, it acts; if it has changed, it does not act.

original: snga ma las gyur du zin kyang mthu dang ldan pa las 'byung gi / mthu med pa las ma yin no //
analyzed: snga ma las gyur du zin kyang mthu dang ldan pa las 'byung gi / mthu med pa las ma yin no //
translated: Even though it has changed from the previous, it arises from that which is powerful, not from that which is not powerful.

original: mthu dang ldan du zin kyang de dang mthun zhing 'phrod pa las 'byung gi / mi mthun mi 'phrod pa las ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mthu dang ldan du zin kyang de dang mthun zhing 'phrod pa las 'byung gi / mi mthun mi 'phrod pa las ni ma yin te /
translated: Even though it is powerful, it arises from that which is suitable and appropriate, not from that which is not suitable and appropriate.

original: de ltar na rnam pa bdun po 'di dag gis rgyu rnams ci rigs par rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa bdun po 'di dag gis rgyu rnams ci rigs par rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, the causes should be understood as established in various ways through these seven aspects.

original: de la mtshan nyid gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtshan nyid gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the establishment of the designation of characteristics?

original: de ni rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood as sevenfold:

original: lus dang dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / kun nas slong ba dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / rnam par nges pa dang / 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: lus dang dmigs pa dang / rnam pa dang / kun nas slong ba dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / rnam par nges pa dang / 'jug pa'o //
translated: Body, object, aspect, motivation, classification, ascertainment, and engagement.

original: de la sdom ni /
analyzed: de la sdom ni /
translated: The summary is:

original: mtshan nyid kyi ni mdor bsdu ba //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi ni mdor bsdu ba //
translated: The characteristics are summarized🔽in body, object, aspect,

original: lus dang dmigs pa rnam pa dang // kun nas slong dang rab dbye dang // rnam par nges dang 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: lus dang dmigs pa rnam pa dang // kun nas slong dang rab dbye dang // rnam par nges dang 'jug pa yin //
translated: motivation, classification, ascertainment, and engagement.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi lus gang zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi lus gang zhe na /
translated: What is the body of applied thought and sustained thought?

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams dmigs pa la mngon par mi rtog pa ni sems pa'i lus yin la /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams dmigs pa la mngon par mi rtog pa ni sems pa'i lus yin la /
translated: The body of applied thought and sustained thought is the mental body, which is the non-investigation of the object.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams dmigs pa la mngon par rtog pa ni shes pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams dmigs pa la mngon par rtog pa ni shes pa'i lus yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The body of applied thought and sustained thought is the cognitive body, which is the investigation of the object.

original: de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi dmigs pa gang zhe na /🔽ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs la brten pa'i @58a * //
analyzed: de la rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi dmigs pa gang zhe na / ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs la brten pa'i @58a * //
translated: What is the object of applied thought and sustained thought?

original: don ni dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: don ni dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The object is the meaning that is based on the collection of names, the collection of phrases, and the collection of letters.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the mode of activity of initial inquiry and investigation?

original: rtog pa'i rnam pa ni /
analyzed: rtog pa'i rnam pa ni /
translated: The mode of activity of initial inquiry is

original: dmigs pa de nyid la gtod cing bye brag tu gtod pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa de nyid la gtod cing bye brag tu gtod pa'o //
translated: to direct the mind to the object and to hold it there.

original: dpyod pa'i rnam pa ni de nyid la so sor rtog pa'o //
analyzed: dpyod pa'i rnam pa ni de nyid la so sor rtog pa'o //
translated: The mode of activity of investigation is to examine the object.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyis ci zhig kun nas slong zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyis ci zhig kun nas slong zhe na /
translated: What is the instigation of initial inquiry and investigation?

original: ngag kun nas slong ngo //
analyzed: ngag kun nas slong ngo //
translated: They instigate speech.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the classification of initial inquiry and investigation?

original: rab tu dbye ba rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: rab tu dbye ba rnam pa bdun te /
translated: There are seven kinds:

original: mtshan ma can dang / mtshan ma can ma yin pa nas /🔽nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: mtshan ma can dang / mtshan ma can ma yin pa nas / nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no //
translated: with signs, without signs,🔽with mental application, without mental application,

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam par nges pa gang zhe na /🔽rtog pa dang dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa yang yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam par nges pa gang zhe na / rtog pa dang dpyod pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa yang yin no //
translated: What is the definition of initial inquiry and investigation?🔽Initial inquiry and investigation are discursive thought.

original: rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa yang yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa yang yin la /
translated: Discursive thought is initial inquiry and investigation.

original: rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa yin no /🔽de ltar rtog pa dang dpyod pa gang yin pa de rnam par rtog pa yang yin mod kyi /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa yin no / de ltar rtog pa dang dpyod pa gang yin pa de rnam par rtog pa yang yin mod kyi /
translated: The conceptualization that is a conceptualization of that is discursiveness and investigation.

original: rnam par rtog pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yin la /
translated: Thus, whatever is discursiveness and investigation is also conceptualization.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa ma yin pa yang yod de /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa ma yin pa yang yod de /
translated: But there is also conceptualization that is not discursiveness and investigation.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa yin la rtog pa dang dpyod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa yin la rtog pa dang dpyod pa ma yin no //
translated: All mental activities and mental factors that occur in the three realms, except for supramundane wisdom, are conceptualization but not discursiveness and investigation.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the occurrence of discursiveness and investigation?

original: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni ci /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni ci /
translated: What are the forms of discursiveness and investigation of hell beings?

original: 'dus te reg pa ni ji lta bu /🔽ci zhig gis ni spyod /
analyzed: 'dus te reg pa ni ji lta bu / ci zhig gis ni spyod /
translated: What is their contact?🔽What do they experience?

original: ci dang ni ldan /
analyzed: ci dang ni ldan /
translated: What do they possess?

original: ci zhig ni 'dod /
analyzed: ci zhig ni 'dod /
translated: What do they desire?

original: las ni ci zhig byed cing 'jug / sems can dmyal ba pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: las ni ci zhig byed cing 'jug / sems can dmyal ba pa rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du /
translated: What actions does it perform?

original: dud 'gro rnams dang / yi dags rnams dang / mi rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i lha rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni ci /
analyzed: dud 'gro rnams dang / yi dags rnams dang / mi rnams dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i lha rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni ci /
translated: What are the forms of investigation and analysis of animals, ghosts, humans, gods in the desire realm, and gods in the first absorption?

original: 'dus te reg pa ni ji lta bu ci zhig zer ci zhig gis ni bskyod /
analyzed: 'dus te reg pa ni ji lta bu ci zhig zer ci zhig gis ni bskyod /
translated: What is contact? What is it called? What moves it?

original: ci dang ni ldan /
analyzed: ci dang ni ldan /
translated: What does it possess?

original: ci zhig ni 'dod /
analyzed: ci zhig ni 'dod /
translated: What does it desire?

original: las ni ci zhig byed cing 'jug ce na /
analyzed: las ni ci zhig byed cing 'jug ce na /
translated: What actions does it perform?

original: de la sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni gcig tu nges par zhum pa'i rnam pa dang / mi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg @58b pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis bskyod pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: de la sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni gcig tu nges par zhum pa'i rnam pa dang / mi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg @58b pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis bskyod pa dang / yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa dang /
translated: The investigation and analysis of hell beings is definitely of one type: it is the form of investigation and analysis that is timid, contact with unpleasant objects, moved by suffering, and associated with mental dissatisfaction.

original: sdug bsngal las thar bar 'dod pa dang / sems kun nas 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go //
analyzed: sdug bsngal las thar bar 'dod pa dang / sems kun nas 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go //
translated: They are engaged in and perform actions that are agitated in mind.

original: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as with the hell beings,

original: yi dags sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: yi dags sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: so it is with the hungry ghosts who are suffering.

original: dud 'gro rnams dang / mi rnams dang / yi dags rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni zhum pa'i rnam pa shas che la /🔽kun tu dga' ba'i rnam pa shas chung ba dang / mi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa shas che la /
analyzed: dud 'gro rnams dang / mi rnams dang / yi dags rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni zhum pa'i rnam pa shas che la / kun tu dga' ba'i rnam pa shas chung ba dang / mi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa shas che la /
translated: The conceptual thoughts and analyses of animals, humans, and hungry ghosts with great magical powers are predominantly of the type that are slack,🔽and they are predominantly of the type that are not joyful.🔽They are predominantly of the type that are contacts with unpleasant objects,🔽and they are predominantly of the type that are contacts with pleasant objects.

original: sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa shas chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis bskyod pa'i shas che la /
analyzed: sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa shas chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis bskyod pa'i shas che la /
translated: They are predominantly of the type that are agitated by suffering,🔽and they are predominantly of the type that are agitated by pleasure.

original: bde bas bskyod pa'i shas chung ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa'i shas che la /
analyzed: bde bas bskyod pa'i shas chung ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa'i shas che la /
translated: They are predominantly of the type that are associated with mental dissatisfaction,🔽and they are predominantly of the type that are associated with mental satisfaction.

original: yid bde ba dang ldan pa'i shas chung ba dang / sdug bsngal las thar par 'dod pa'i shas che la /🔽bde ba dang 'grogs par 'dod pa'i shas chung ba dang / sems kun nas 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go //
analyzed: yid bde ba dang ldan pa'i shas chung ba dang / sdug bsngal las thar par 'dod pa'i shas che la / bde ba dang 'grogs par 'dod pa'i shas chung ba dang / sems kun nas 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go //
translated: They are predominantly the mental factors of desire to be accompanied by pleasure and the mental factors of desire to be free from suffering.🔽The mental factors of the gods of the desire realm are predominantly the mental factors of joy and the mental factors of desire to be free from suffering.🔽They are predominantly the mental factors of desire to be free from suffering and the mental factors of desire to be accompanied by pleasure.

original: yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa'i shas chung ba dang / bde ba dang 'grogs par 'dod pa'i shas che la /
analyzed: yid mi bde ba dang ldan pa'i shas chung ba dang / bde ba dang 'grogs par 'dod pa'i shas che la /
translated: They are predominantly the mental factors of desire to be accompanied by pleasure and the mental factors of desire to be free from suffering.🔽They are predominantly the mental factors of desire to be accompanied by pleasure

original: sdug bsngal las thar par 'dod pa'i shas chung ba dang / sems kun du 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go //
analyzed: sdug bsngal las thar par 'dod pa'i shas chung ba dang / sems kun du 'khrugs pa'i las byed cing 'jug go //
translated: and the action and function of the mind is to be free from suffering.

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i lha rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i lha rnams kyi rtog pa dang dpyod pa rnams ni /
translated: The conceptualization and discernment of the gods of the first concentration are:🔽unanimously joyful,🔽unanimously in contact with pleasant internal objects,🔽unanimously moved by pleasure,

original: gcig tu nges par kun tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / gcig tu nges par nang gi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa dang / gcig tu nges par bde bas bskyod pa dang / gcig tu nges par yid bde ba dang ldan pa dang /🔽gcig tu nges par bde ba dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang / sems kun tu mi 'khrugs pa'i las byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu nges par kun tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang / gcig tu nges par nang gi sdug pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa dang / gcig tu nges par bde bas bskyod pa dang / gcig tu nges par yid bde ba dang ldan pa dang / gcig tu nges par bde ba dang mi 'bral bar 'dod pa dang / sems kun tu mi 'khrugs pa'i las byed pa yin no //
translated: unanimously accompanied by mental pleasure,🔽unanimously desiring not to be separated from pleasure,

original: de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa @59a * //
analyzed: de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa @59a * //
translated: and the action and function of the mind is to be undisturbed.

original: gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: gdags pa rnam par gzhag pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the definition of proper mental attention?

original: de ni rnam pa brgyad du rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de ni rnam pa brgyad du rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood as being of eight kinds:

original: gnas dang dngos po dang / tshol ba dang / longs spyod pa dang / yang dag par 'grub pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i tshogs la sbyor ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshogs la sbyor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: gnas dang dngos po dang / tshol ba dang / longs spyod pa dang / yang dag par 'grub pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i tshogs la sbyor ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshogs la sbyor ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa la sbyor ba'o //
translated: and the application to the accomplishment of the perfections.

original: de la sdom ni /
analyzed: de la sdom ni /
translated: The summary is:🔽The basis, and likewise the entity,🔽the search, and the enjoyment,
